hero.headline: Engineering the Future of Enterprise
hero.subhead: We don't just write code or rack servers. We deliver outcomes. From modernization to physical deployment, access a unified catalog of engineering capabilities designed for the Fortune 500.

featuredSolution.title: Legacy to Cloud Modernization
featuredSolution.summary: Stop accumulating technical debt. We re-platform monolithic legacy systems into scalable, secure, and maintainable cloud-native microservices architectures without disrupting business continuity.

solutions.title: Custom Software Engineering
solutions.summary: Full-cycle product development for mission-critical applications. We handle everything from architecture design to production rollout using domain-driven design.

solutions.title: Data Center Turnkey Deployment
solutions.summary: End-to-end physical infrastructure fulfillment. We procure, rack, stack, cable, and configure server farms and private clouds with strict SLA adherence.

solutions.title: Enterprise AI & Data Intelligence
solutions.summary: Transform raw data into decision-grade intelligence. We build data lakes, ETL pipelines, and deploy custom machine learning models for predictive analytics.

solutions.title: Industrial Edge & IoT Connectivity
solutions.summary: Deploy compute power where your data lives. We design ruggedized edge networks and IoT sensor grids for factories, oil rigs, and smart cities.

solutions.title: 24/7 Managed Cloud Operations (SRE)
solutions.summary: Sleep soundly while we watch your systems. Our Site Reliability Engineers (SREs) provide round-the-clock monitoring, incident response, and performance tuning.

solutions.title: Cybersecurity & Governance
solutions.summary: Zero-trust architecture implementation and compliance automation. We secure your software supply chain and ensure adherence to GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC2.

summaryBlocks.headline: The 'One-Handshake' Advantage
summaryBlocks.content: Stop juggling five different vendors for one project. InfraTech provides a single chain of custody for your entire technical estate. If the software fails, we fix it. If the server fails, we replace it. Total accountability.

summaryBlocks.headline: Compliance is Not an Afterthought
summaryBlocks.content: We work in the world's most regulated sectors. Our delivery framework bake in audit trails, data sovereignty, and security controls from Day 0, reducing your risk profile significantly.

faqs.question: How do you handle engagement models?
faqs.answer: We offer Time & Materials (T&M) for agile software projects, Fixed Price for defined infrastructure deployments, and Managed Services SLAs for ongoing operations.

faqs.question: Can you procure hardware for us?
faqs.answer: Yes. We are authorized partners with major OEMs (Dell, HPE, Cisco). We handle the entire procurement, logistics, and customs clearance process for your infrastructure.

faqs.question: Do you support hybrid cloud environments?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Our specialization is bridging the gap between on-premise hardware and public cloud (AWS/Azure), ensuring seamless connectivity and unified governance.

faqs.question: What is your typical lead time for a project?
faqs.answer: Software discovery phases typically start within 1-2 weeks. Physical infrastructure timelines depend on hardware availability, but we usually deploy within 4-6 weeks of PO.

ctaSection.headline: Stop Compromising on Your Infrastructure
ctaSection.subhead: Whether you need a new software platform or a physical data center, we have the engineers to build it.
